I'm trying to make a handler that can download a XML file as an attachment. However,  I don't know what I am doing wrong. Could somebody point me in the right direction?
```function send_xml(request::HTTP.Request) 
    
    local xmlstring
    open("test.xml") do fh
        xmlstring = read(fh, String)
    end
    HTTP.header(request, "Content-Type: text/xml")
    HTTP.header(request, "Content-Length: $(length(xmlstring))")
    HTTP.header(request, "Content-Disposition: attachment; filename=myxml.xml")

    return xmlstring
end```

text:
This is what the final code looked like
```function send_xml(::HTTP.Request) 

    xmlstring = open("test.xml") do fh
        read(fh, String)
    end

    headers = [
        "Content-Type" => "text/xml",
        "Content-Length" => "$(length(xmlstring))",
        "Content-Disposition" => "attachment; filename=ADELoverlappingProcessWindow.xml"
        ]

    return HTTP.Response(200, headers, body=xmlstring)
end```
